awards.text: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 4 nominations.

fullplot: A young family are visited by ghosts in their home. At first the ghosts appear friendly, moving objects around the house to the amusement of everyone, then they turn nasty and start to terrorise the family before they "kidnap" the youngest daughter.
plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.
title: Poltergeist

tomatoes.consensus: Smartly filmed, tightly scripted, and -- most importantly -- consistently frightening, Poltergeist is a modern horror classic.
